title: Pixel 4xl camera recording issue "something went wrong..." Or "other app is using mic..."
content: I am facing a very annoying issue with default camera app. When I start to record video within few seconds I get message saying " Can't record audio, another app is using the mic."  And "Something went wrong - part of this video may not be saved." Then the video fails. I can't record any video now. I recently opted for Android 11 beta and this started not sure related or not. I tried reinstalling app, clearing cache permission and all default troubleshooting but of no use. Desperately need help.
